entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12 except minus 17 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12 except minus 17 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022
